articles.description: Ahead of Monday Night Raw "Legends Night," Hulk Hogan digs in on Randy Savage, The Undertaker and the upcoming biopic about his life.
articles.content:
Hulk Hogan knows about being the hero and the villain.
He has played both roles during his four decades in wrestling. In the ring, he was the red-and-yellow-clad "Hulkster" during the WWF's rise in … [+12966 chars]
